item.title: Tooling
item.description: When open sourcing a repository, we run a few compliance checks. Security We run snyk on all outgoing repositories. Snyk requires the build to happen, such that all the relevant dependencies are downloaded. When installing snyk, it may ask you to log in. Do so with the company sso option. Usage: git clone ... cd path/to/repo # do the thing to build the project npx snyk test --all-projects The output of that command will say if there are issues.
